topics.body:
So my old roommate is gone and in rehab. As such I am looking for a new guy (found one) and am being very discriminating against drug users.

Everyone tries to convince me that they're 'responsible drug users'. 
Until I tell them about the last guy and how he said the exact same thing, and how many people also tell me the exact same thing.

They act like I'm taking their rights away. God damn.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
I just had an idea for a buff/debuff type character
Basically they would be a Druid type deal and their ability would be that they give enemies and allies animal traits as buffs or debuffs and the stronger versions would be different animals. 

Like their haste buff would dog<wolf<lion<cheetah and they would give characters the legs of the respective animals

And the slow debuff would be turtle<snail<barnacle

This could have some adorable results.
